trends: There has been one other sighting in Elberfeld
There were no other sightings in Elberfeld on or around February 24th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsFeb 24, 2013 6:11 pm. I was standing in my back yard around a campfire looking at the northern sky. I saw this extremely bright object traveling across the sky. It wasn't flashing just constant bright light just like a star but a lot brighter and bigger than any star in the sky. I watched it for about 15 seconds when it ejected an object out of it. A small orb glowing bright blue and it looked like a halo around it lilt up the sky around it for about 10 seconds then went out. my son got my binoculars and i followed it for about another 15 seconds when it changed colors to orange and then blood red and then it just vanished gone disappeared. There was 3 very high altitude planes over head when ufo was there and after it left..
Summary: bright starlike object bigger and brighter than any star I have ever seen
